sentences.sContent: It will shortly be put up for sale under the terms already communicated to you, which, to recapitulate , call for a very minimum of publicity.
sentences.sContent_eng: It will shortly be put up for sale under the terms already communicated to you, which, to recapitulate , call for a very minimum of publicity.
sentences.sCn: 不久它就可以上市，按照我们与你商定的条款进行销售，重申一遍，这些条款尽量不要对外公开。

remMethod.val: re(重新) + capit(头) + ulate → 将核心(即“头”)重新讲述一遍 → 扼要重述

trans.tranOther: to repeat the main points of something that has just been said
